function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Labor shortages due to illness and quarantine of construction workers leading to project delays and cancellations.","Impact":"Project delays and cancellations, decreased productivity, increased costs.","Mitigation":"Implement safety protocols, provide protective equipment, and ensure regular testing and monitoring of workers.","Technologies":"Temperature screening, contact tracing apps, remote collaboration tools.","People":"Construction workers, project managers, contractors.","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, health and safety authorities."}]}
